mapped_sequence.description: Basic path string operations (getting absolute path, base name, parent directory, splitting and joining paths)
Basic file opening operations for writing (normal writing, binary writing)
Writing data to files (strings or bytes)

pattern_analysis.contextual_code:
for to, src in to_src:
    txt = get_and_replace(src, binary=True, version=version, extra_cmd="")
    dest = os.path.join(base_dir, to)
    os.unlink(dest)
    with open(dest, "wb") as f:
        f.write(txt)
